questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
Confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report
start the equipment and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.
shift the equipment to another place where the AC Voltage of 230 is provided
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the continuity of 3 fuses (F1, F2, F3) and confirm whether they are defective
replace the fuses accordingly
check whether the Input and Outputs are available at the transformer.
replace the Transformer with a new one
replace the PCB with a new one
check and confirm whether unable to set / change the Temperature
open the equipment, check the continuity of switches and confirm whether they are defective.
replace the switches with a new one
replace the PCB with a new one
check and confirm whether the Service manual LED Indicator illuminates
replace the PCB with a new one

videos.videoName: Video required for replacing the PCB

questions.question: check and confirm whether 2nd, 3rd and Service manual LEDs are flashing.
heater wire clip circuit is error, so repair / replace the PCB with a new one

videos.videoName: Video required for replacing the PCB

questions.question: check and confirm whether 2nd and Service manual LEDs are flashing.
heater control TRIAC is error, so repair/replace the PCB with a new one

videos.videoName: Video required for replacing the PCB

questions.question: check and confirm whether 2nd & 3rd LED indicators are illuminates and Service manual LED is flashing.
Heater wire relay fault. So, repair / replace the PCB with a new one

videos.videoName: Video required for replacing the PCB

questions.question: check and confirm whether 1st and 3rd LEDs illuminate and Service manual LED flashes.
replace the heater wire adaptor with a new one
check and confirm whether 3rd LED illuminates and Service manual LED is flashing.
replace the heater wire adaptor with a new one
check and confirm whether 1st & 2nd LEDs illuminates and Service manual LED is flashing.
replace the thermistor with a new one
check and confirm whether 2nd LED illuminates and Service manual LED is flashing.
replace the thermistor with a new one
check and confirm whether the heater plate is not getting heated after setting the temperature.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the thermal cut out continuity and confirm whether it is defective
replace it with a new one
reset the thermal cut out and confirm whether problem still persist.
replace the heater plate with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the Heater plate

questions.question: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
